ingredients.item: 190g jar Sacla’ Intenso Stir In Tomato & Olive Sauce
2 Waitrose Large Flat Mushrooms, peeled and sliced
50g Waitrose Castelvetrano Olives, pitted and roughly chopped
3 tbsp Felippo Berio Extra Virgin Olive Oil

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 220°C, gas mark 7. Make the ciabatta bread according to the pack instructions and roll out into 28x37cm rectangle. Place on a large baking tray.

Spread with the sauce and add the tomatoes, then the mushrooms and olives. Sprinkle over half the mozzarella. Tear the prosciutto and lay it on the pizza. Sprinkle over the remaining mozzarella and bake for 15-20 minutes until golden.
Meanwhile, place the gremolata ingredients in a small food processor and blitz. Drizzle over the hot pizza and serve.
